name: TanksDisputes
description:
A simple movement control game where the player needs to control one or more tanks to avoid traps and get gold

Some tanks will move in the same direction as the player, while others will move in the opposite direction. Remember to complete the goal within the required number of steps!

good luck!

The game is not yet complete, currently only at 20 level, just play, does not represent the final result

You can see the mine model hasn't been made yet

There is no model for the gold machine

I hope to have your visit

Is there anything else you can add to the level

Were the levels too difficult?

Let me know and leave a comment

I'll be very grateful to you

  • WASD or directional control
